unittitle_ssm: Brooklyn Art Club annual exhibition catalogs
abstract_ssm: The Brooklyn Art Club annual exhibition catalogs span the years 1882 to 1898 and are housed in one half manuscript box. The collection consists of both originals and photocopies of annual exhibition catalogs of the Brooklyn Art Club.
collection_ssm: Brooklyn Art Club annual exhibition catalogs
heading_ssm: Brooklyn Art Club annual exhibition catalogs

collection_sim: Brooklyn Art Club annual exhibition catalogs
